line.comment: * Protects border reachable sectors, giving priority to enemy-claimed sectors, then hot sectors, then random sectors.
* Zero Hour allows it to also go into non-border sectors, giving priority to NOT enemy-claimed but hot sectors, then claimed sectors, then random sectors
* we join the closest OCV Hunter squadron (can be from another faction)
* when rearguards are currently doing our job we must follow them and should not attack alone

sval.val: Protects border reachable sectors, giving priority to enemy-claimed sectors, then hot sectors, then random sectors.
Zero Hour allows it to also go into non-border sectors, giving priority to NOT enemy-claimed but hot sectors, then claimed sectors, then random sectors
we join the closest OCV Hunter squadron (can be from another faction)
when rearguards are currently doing our job we must follow them and should not attack alone
